title: If you could change one thing...
body:
About yourself, something in your life, the world, or even league what would it be? And why?

As of now I am actually very content with my life, though a few years ago some of the things I would've wanted to change would be my height, I used to be very insecure about how I looked from being picked on during my school years and wished I looked different so there was that. 

That's all I'll share for now. Let's hear what you have to say. :)
